biography: Giovanni Brass better known as Tinto Brass, is an Italian filmmaker. He is noted especially for his work in the erotic genre, with films such as Cos√¨ fan tutte (released under the English title All Ladies Do It), Paprika, Monella (Frivolous Lola) and Trasgredire.
